attributes.action: Restricting the amount of cars that enter cities by 2025
attributes.background: Our planet is falling apart. It is little things like this that can make a difference. We can't wait for others to do this. The action needs to start now !

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do to restrict the number of cars in cities. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. Responsibility for transport policy is devolved in some cities. We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
